com.tinmegali.security.mcipher

Interface MDecryptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MDecryptorDefault

    public interface MDecryptor
    Decryption interface that facilitates the decryption process. Build a MDecryptor using its builder, the MDecryptorBuilder. Notice that, for the decryption to have success, the MDecryptor characteristics, defined during its build, must be compatible with the ones defined for MEncryptor during its build.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] encryptedData, android.content.Context context)
      Decrypts an encrypted byte array.

      Decrypts an encrypted String.
      java.lang.String decryptString(java.lang.String encryptedString, android.content.Context context)
      Decrypts an encrypted String.
      java.lang.String getAlias()
      Get the current Key Alias, defined during build time, used as an unique identifier in the KeyStore.

    • Method Detail

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(byte[] encryptedData,
               android.content.Context context)
        throws MDecryptorException
        Decrypts an encrypted byte array.
        Parameters:
        encryptedData - a byte array with the encrypted data.
        context - the context must only be passed when the method is called from SDK previous to 23.
        Returns:
        a decrypted byte array.
        Throws:
        MDecryptorException - wraps all possible exception for the decryption process. To access the original exception call Throwable.getCause().

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(java.lang.String encryptedString,
               android.content.Context context)
        throws MDecryptorException
        Decrypts an encrypted String.
        Parameters:
        encryptedString - a String to be decrypted. It must have been encoded using MCipherUtils.encodeEncrypted(byte[]) method.
        context - the context must only be passed when the method is called from SDK previous to 23.
        Returns:
        a decrypted byte array.
        Throws:
        MDecryptorException - wraps all possible exception for the decryption process. To access the original exception call Throwable.getCause().

      • decryptString

        java.lang.String decryptString(java.lang.String encryptedString,
                               android.content.Context context)
                        throws MDecryptorException
        Decrypts an encrypted String.
        Parameters:
        encryptedString - a String to be decrypted. It must have been encoded using MCipherUtils.encodeEncrypted(byte[]) method.
        context - the context must only be passed when the method is called from SDK previous to 23.
        Returns:
        a decrypted String.
        Throws:
        MDecryptorException - wraps all possible exception for the decryption process. To access the original exception call Throwable.getCause().

      • getAlias

        java.lang.String getAlias()
        Get the current Key Alias, defined during build time, used as an unique identifier in the KeyStore.
        Returns:
        the current alias of the MDecryptor.
